Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes Nicholas Budney to receive certain credit under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law
Summary: Authorizes Nicholas Budney, a town of Hamburg police officer, to receive certain credit under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize Nicholas Budney to receive certain credit under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law
